key.name: ie-folder
key.summary: Folder to import to or export from.
key.description: Defines the folder that the batch operations are applied to/from. There is no recursion into subfolders.

key.name: import-skip
key.summary: Do not delete existing playlists that match names using "Import Playlists".
key.description: Default behavious is to clear all non-auto playlists and import from the set folder. If set this will not delete matching playlist names.
